nodes.text: The Separatist Senate Building was a prominent structure in Raxus Secundus's capital city, as it was home to the Separatist Parliament during the Clone Wars.

The Separatist Parliament complex was located in the middle of the city, with circular streets encompassing it and a plaza with trees nearly encompassed by the complex. Inside the main building was the senate chambers, with rows of representatives seated on each side of the Separatist Congress Leader's podium. Count Dooku would appear in either hologram form or in person to preside over important decisions.
